title: Mattermost themes
description: Defines a theme associated with a Team.

awayIndicator.description: Color of the away indicator appearing next to team members names in the direct messages list when they have had no browser activity for 5 minutes.

buttonBg.description: Color of the rectangular background behind all high priority UI buttons.

buttonColor.description: Text color appearing on the rectangular background for all high priority UI buttons.

centerChannelBg.description: Color of the center pane, right-hand sidebar and all dialog window backgrounds.

centerChannelColor.description: Color of all the text - with the exception of mentions, links, hashtags and code blocks - in the center pane, right-hand sidebar, and dialogs.

codeTheme.description: Background and syntax colors for all code blocks.

dndIndicator.description: Color of the do not disturb indicator appearing next to team members names in the direct messages list.

linkColor.description: Text color of all links, hashtags, teammate mentions, and low priority UI buttons.

mentionBg.description: Background color of the jewel indicating unread mentions that appears to the right of the channel name. This is also the background color of the “Unread Posts Below/Above” indicator appearing at the top or bottom of the Channels pane on shorter browser windows.

mentionBj.description: Text color on the mention jewel indicating the number of unread mentions. This is also the text color on the “Unread Posts Below/Above” indicator.

mentionHighlightBg.description: Highlight color behind your words that trigger mentions in the center pane and right-hand sidebar.

mentionHighlightLink.description: Text color of your words that trigger mentions in the center pane and right-hand sidebar.

newMessageSeparator.description: The new message separator appears below the last read message when you navigate to a channel with unread messages.

onlineIndicator.description: Color of the online indicator appearing next to team members names in the direct messages list.

sidebarBg.description: Background color of the Channels pane, and Account and Team settings navigation sidebars.

sidebarHeaderBg.description: Background color of the header above the Channels pane and all dialog window headers.

sidebarHeaderTextColor.description: Text color of the header above the Channels pane and all dialog window headers.

sidebarTeamBarBg.description: Background color of the Global Header.

sidebarText.description: Text color of read channels in the Channels pane, and tabs in the Account and Team settings navigation sidebar.

sidebarTextActiveBorder.description: Color of the rectangular marker on the left side of the Channels pane or Settings sidebar indicating the active channel or tab.

sidebarTextActiveColor.description: Text color of the active channel or tab in the Channels pane or Settings sidebar.

sidebarTextHoverBg.description: Background color behind channel names and settings tabs as you hover over them.

sidebarUnreadText.description: Text color of unread channels in the Channels pane.
